```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
library(kdtools)
library(tidyverse)
library(microbenchmark)
```

```{r}
des = expand.grid(nr = 10 ^ (1:7), nc = seq(1, 9, 2))
timer = function(nr, nc)
{
  x = matrix_to_tuples(matrix(runif(nr * nc), nr))
  summary(microbenchmark(kd_sort(x), times = 1), unit = "s")$median
}
t = numeric(nrow(des))
for (i in 1:length(t))
  t[i] = timer(des[i, 1], des[i, 2])
df = cbind(des, t)
```

```{r}
ggplot(df) +
  aes(x = nr, y = t, color = as.factor(nc)) +
  geom_line() + geom_point() +
  scale_x_log10() + scale_y_log10() +
  guides(color = FALSE)
  
```

```{r}
x = matrix(runif(200), nc = 2)
y = kd_sort(matrix_to_tuples(x))
z = as.data.frame(tuples_to_matrix(y))
z$i = 1:nrow(z)
names(z) = c("x", "y", "i")
ggplot(z, aes(x, y)) +
  geom_path() +
  geom_point(aes(color = i), alpha = 0.25, size = 4) +
  scale_color_gradientn(colors = rainbow(100)) +
  guides(color = FALSE) +
  coord_fixed()
  
```
